text.__SUMMARY__: Millettia pterocarpa is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Millettia pterocarpa". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31383A9623789. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31383A9623789.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
